name: Through Galaxies
description:
Through Galaxies

A hardcore shoot'em up featuring weapon switching/upgrading and tough bosses.

Screenshots


Features
  • Maneuver 3 powerful weapons to overwhelm your enemies
  • Upgrade your weapons as you like
  • Dodge countless bullets from everywhere
  • Challenge 3 tough bosses fighting with their own unique style

Release Notes

v1.2.2

  • Update icon to rounded square

v1.2.1

  • Fix the problem that beams would cause crash

v1.2.0

  • (Android)Improve the control: player can tap anywhere to control the ship now.
  • Add some visual effects to score text of HUD
  • Raise the difficulty factor cap to 3.0

v1.1.3

  • Adjust the difficulty curve of extra runs (+0.25/run)
  • Difficulty factor wouldn't affect the number of Asteroids now

v1.1.2

  • Fix bug: avoid applying lethal damage for multiple times

v1.1.1

  • (Web) Fix bug: press enter to submit highscore
  • (Android) Allow dragging over buttons while controlling movement

v1.1

  • Increase the sensitivity of movement control
  • (Android) Replace the joystick with screen-touching control

v1.0.7

  • Reduce the size of boundary box to make enemies leaving screen be destroyed earlier

v1.0.6

  • Add options to adjust the audio volumes
  • (Android) Joystick won't snap its center to finger now

v1.0.5

  • Fix bug: highscore from menu can't receive scores

v1.0.4

  • Fix bug: some droids summoned by Mothership are unreachable
  • Disable Github pages

v1.0.3

  • (Android) Add resume button to pausing screen
  • Let highscore UI in charge of updating, so the coroutine can be stopped by disabling the object
  • Reduce the score of droids summoned by Mothership to 10 (from 100)
